mapper.insert: insert into com_qna(mem_no, com_qna_subject, com_qna_content, com_qna_count, com_qna_writer) values(#{mem_no}, #{com_qna_subject}, #{com_qna_content}, #{com_qna_count}, #{com_qna_writer})
mapper.select: select * from com_qna where com_qna_no>0 order by com_qna_no desc, com_qna_regdate desc
